name: Warrior and the Thief
description:
Ludum Dare 30

You must play with both the Warrior and the Thief at the same time.

Incomplete version of the game here. I just uploaded in the remaining 14 secods to the submssion ends.
Just 4 very simple levels. The engine has much more to offer. Like combat, spikes, holes and a bunch of things
i put in the code put didn't got time to put in the game. Soon i will put a PostCompo entry, with more levels.
